sentence: What did vladimir putin say after dropping a smashing one-liner?
explanation: Putout can mean to extinguish a fire or to make someone feel unwelcome.
first_new_sentence: The firefighters quickly worked to put out the flames that threatened the building.
second_new_sentence: The rude comment made at the party was meant to put out any feelings of comfort among the guests.

sentence: Why is the monsters football pitch wet? because the players keep dribbling on it.
explanation: Dribbling refers to both a basketball skill and uncontrolled saliva falling from the mouth.
first_new_sentence: The point guard was skillfully dribbling the ball down the court during the game.
second_new_sentence: The baby was drooling, and the dribbling was a clear sign that she was teething.
